newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico names Onate as ambassador to London.
newsitem.headline: Mexico names Onate as ambassador to London.

text.p: Mexico said on Friday that Santiago Onate Laborde, former president of the ruling Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI), will be the country's new ambassador to the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland.
A former academic, ambassador and government minister, Onate was president of the PRI from mid-1995 until December last year.
He said in his resignation letter at the time that he was stepping down to give his long-ruling party a chance to change leadership before key mid-term elections set for July.
